alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:09AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, with locally higher amounts above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 40 MPH. * WHERE...Locations including but not limited to Stanley, Clayton, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Hailey, Bellevue, Picabo, Galena and Banner Summits. * WHEN...through 11 AM Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
